name: Whale Miner Bot
desc: Earn TON by clicking once a day, with bonus for inviting friends.
features: Auto mining, referral rewards, daily roulette.
earning: Each click = mine TON, get extra 5% per referral.
tip: Turn off notifications if you're a beginner. Beware of scam types!
review: Withdrew 1 TON in 4 days! Fast payout, earning is possible even without referrals.

name: Lucky Spin Bot
desc: Win TON by roulette, game-style earning.
features: Daily free roulette, mission rewards, extra chances with referrals.
earning: 1 roulette spin = win TON or nothing, bonus for inviting friends.
tip: Small amounts can't be withdrawn. Don't miss daily missions.
review: Got 2 TON in 5 days! Feels great to win the roulette!

name: TON Farm Bot
desc: Harvest TON like growing crops, for long-term profit.
features: Daily growth/harvest, mission achievements, referral bonuses.
earning: Harvest = earn TON, get extra bonus for inviting friends.
tip: Check daily for more profit. Long-term play is recommended.
review: Profits keep accumulating! Withdrew 1.5 TON easily.
